mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_energy_record (record_id, car_id, record_date, station, amount, price, fuel_type) VALUES (t_energy_record_seq.NEXTVAL, #{carId}, #{recordDate}, #{station}, #{amount}, #{price}, #{fuelType})
mapper.select: SELECT record_id, car_id, record_date as recordDate, station, amount, price, fuel_type FROM t_energy_record WHERE car_id = #{carId} ORDER BY record_date DESC
